title: True Detective Season 2: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
In this Spoiler Special, Slate's Willa Paskin, Laura Bennett, and Ben Mathis-Lilley discuss season two of HBO's True Detective. WARNING: This podcast contains spoilers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
